title: Mammoth Cave National Park: Suggested Reading
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Professional Development     Suggested Reading                Environmental Education Bibliography       Leslie, Clare W, and Charles E. Roth. Keeping a Nature Journal: Discover a Whole New Way of Seeing the World Around You. North Adams, MA: Storey Pub, 2003. Print. Louv, Richard. Last Child in the Woods: Saving Our Children from Nature-Deficit Disorder. Chapel Hill, NC: Algonquin Books of Chapel Hill, 2006. Print Sampson, Scott D. How to Raise a Wild Child: The Art and Science of Falling in Love with Nature. , 2015. Print.  Seuss, Dr.  The Lorax. New York: Random House, 1971. Print. Silverstein, Shel, and Shel Silverstein. The Giving Tree. New York: Harper & Row, 1964. Print. Stone, Michael K. Smart by Nature: Schooling for Sustainability. Healdsburg, Calif: Watershed Media, 2009. Print.     Ward, Jennifer. I Love Dirt!: 52 Activities to Help You and Your Kids Discover the Wonders of Nature. Boston: Trumpeter, 2008. Print.
